45033.いい素材を見つけたのに かばんが いっぱい！\nそんな 切ない思いをする前に\n:
You've found some fine materials, but your bag
is full! I'm sure you'll be happy to know that
we have a storage facility.

45034.当店の人気商品 きんのゆびわは\nあのキラキラした宝石の魔物も 持っているとか。:
Our most popular item, the Gold Ring, is also in the possession of the glittering jewel monster. If you need a few, try killing them.
! Attention ! We will not be held responsible if you are beaten to a pulp as a result.

45035.仲間を連れての戦闘は 「さくせん」次第。\nもし なかなか勝てない魔物が いるな:
Battling with friends depends on your
"Tactics". If there's a monster you can't
defeat, change "Tactics" and give it a shot!

45036.これまでの <kyodai>の錬金結果\n大成功……１回 成功……３回\n失敗…:
Alchemy results of <kyodai> so far.
Great Success ----- 1    Success ----------- 3
Failure --------- 628    Injuries ---------- 0

45037.カメさまのご加護に感謝し 日々を送ろう。\n巫女さまを 皆で支えよう。:
We live our lives in gratitude for the
blessings of the turtle. We all support the
shrine maiden.

45038.大金庫の扉は かたく 閉ざされている。: The large vault door is locked tight!

Turn left, head up the hill and follow the

3rd Monster Arena Tournament Champion
               Goowain's Grave

Monster Master Guskov's partner

70554.<center>まもの使い ドロテオの相棒\n<center>サーラ ここに眠る:

75448.返事がない……。\nただの 壊れたカカシのようだ。:
There's no reply.
It's just a broken scarecrow.

75449.扉は ボロボロに壊れており 開きそうにない。: The door is broken and will not open.

75450.<center>神より与えられた この広い世界で\n<center>我らは 姿の:
In this world given to us by the gods, we vow to live together with one another, supporting our companions of different forms.
We wish this vow eternal, and leave behind the images of our beloved companions in this very place, the center of the world.

75451.<center>『風の民 エルフ』\n<center>自然を愛し 森と共に生きる:
"Elves, People of Wind" They are beautiful people with wings on their back who love
nature and live with the forest. They value tradition, studied the ways of the world, and produced
many excellent spellcasters.

75452.<center>『炎の民 オーガ』\n<center>厳しい荒野で チカラ強く生:
"Ogres, People of Fire" They live strong in the harsh lands, with large bodies, horns and
tails. They are belligerent, respect the strong and use their superior strength and stamina to
risk their lives for the weak.

75453.<center>『地の民 ドワーフ』\n<center>雄大な山々に恩恵を受け:
"Dwarves, People of Earth" They live with the earth, blessed by the majestic mountains, with small
bodies and big ears. With their high technology and strong desires, they built many advanced civilizations
with their pure dexterity and speed.

75454.<center>『水の民 ウェディ』\n<center>海に浮かぶ美しい島々で:
"Weddie, People of Water" They live freely on beautiful islands in the sea and their bodies are blue like
water. They hate constraints and value singing and love. They use their speed and strength to fight only when they
have to protect those they love.

75455.<center>『花の民 プクリポ』\n<center>絵本のような色彩の町で:
"Pukulipo, People of Flowers" In a town with colors like a picture book, they have fluffy, adorable
little bodies living in search of fun. Born with strong magical power and dexterity, they are more
passionate about creating things for fun than for fighting.

75456.<center>『勇の民 人間』\n<center>どんな地でも 生きていける\:
"Humans, People of Courage" They have bodies that are not too big or too small to survive in any land. They
may not have any outstanding qualities, but when faced with a crisis, they have the courage to
stand up against it.

75457.<center>『空の民 竜族』\n<center>はるか かなたより\n<ce:
"Nadravians, People of the Sky" The sacred beings who watch over the world from afar. Whenever there is a
conflict below, they fly over and bring peace with their great powers.

75458.<center>神より与えられた この広い世界で\n<center>我らは 姿の:
In this world given to us by the gods, we vow to live together with one another, supporting our companions of different forms.
We wish this vow eternal, and leave behind the images of our beloved companions in this very place, the center of the world.

75907.<center>この世界で 平和に 暮らしていた\n<center>すべての 生:
All the living beings who lived peacefully in this world are in danger of extinction. Now there are two suns
rising in the sky. The second sun has turned this world into a hell since it appeared and is now running through the sky
at will, scorching the earth, drying up the sea, and sending people into a burning despair. We have no way
of knowing why there were two suns. All we know is that all living things on this earth are about to be destroyed.

75908.<center>『風の民 エルフ』\n<center>自然を愛し 森と共に生きる:

79155.<pc>は\n石碑に 刻まれている文字を 読んだ。\n<br>\n白き道は 白き:
You read the words carved on the stone monument.
The white path will be opened with white light. That light will rest in the white door.
The gray path will be opened with gray light. That light will rest in the gray door.
The black path will be opened with black light. That light will rest in the black door.
When the three paths are opened, we will reach the Creatorium.

79156.<pc>は\n石碑に 刻まれている文字を 読んだ。\n<br>\n白き道は 白き:

The gray path will be opened with gray light. That light will rest in the gray door.
The black path will be opened with black light. That light will rest in the black door.
When the three paths are opened, we will reach the Creatorium.

137564.<left>来たれ！ 学び舎 アスフェルド学園！\n<left>個性あふれる た:
Welcome! Asfeld Academy!
We hope you will enjoy your school life with
many unique friends.

137565.<left>アスフェルド学園行きの列車は\n<left>直通運転と なっておりま:
This train is a direct line to Asfeld Academy.
Please be careful not to miss the return trip
time.

137566.<left>全生徒 完全個室！\n<left>あなたの 快適な学園生活をサポート:
Student Private Rooms!
This is a dormitory that supports your
comfortable school life.

137567.<left>グランゼドーラ駅行き列車の\n<left>発車時刻が 貼りだされてい:
The departure time of the train to the Gran
Zedora Station is posted on the wall.

137569.<left>サクラの季節に なりました！\n<left>入学 進級 おめでとうご:
It's cherry blossom season!
Congratulations on making it to the next
grade. I hope you have a fruitful year.

137570.<left>気温の高い日が 続きそうです！\n<left>通学時の 日よけ対策は:
It's going to be a very hot day!
Protect yourself from the sun while commuting
to school. Be careful of heat stroke.

137571.<left>寒暖の差が 激しい季節に なってきました！\n<left>気候に合っ:
It's getting to be a season of extreme
temperature swings! Dress appropriately for
the weather and take good care of yourselves.

137572.<left>雪道は すべりやすく たいへん危険です。\n<left>登下校の際に:
Snowy roads are slippery and very dangerous.
Please take extra care on your way to and from
school.

137573.<left>『アスフェルド学園 川柳コンテスト結果発表』と\n<left>書かれ:
There was a piece of paper on the wall that read, "Asfeld Academy Haiku Contest Results". read the poems that were chosen.
Honorable Mentions:
If you come across a Fel Mark, bring it to the school shop right away!
For the time being, have yakisoba bread when you are in a pinch!
Merit Award:
It is in the school yard where you will discover the light of friendship!
The vegetable garden has some crisp lettuce that's growing in it.
First Prize:
I will die later. I am in the middle of a test period.

137574.<left>『アスフェルド学園新聞 号外』\n<left>昨日未明 校舎内で ド:
"Asfeld Academy News - Extra Issue" In the early hours of yesterday, a student using a dolboard collided with another student
in the school building, resulting in injury! Fortunately, the injuries to the students were minor, but the student council led a campaign
to enforce the rules of dolboard use. Student Council President Eisel said the following, "Rules are there so that everyone can have a
good time, right? Let's make Asfeld Academy a place where all students follow the rules and are kind to others and to themselves!"

137575.<left>クラス対抗の さまざまな催しがあるようだ。: There are a variety of class rivalry events.

137576.<left>図書室の 新刊入荷リストのようだ。\n<left><pc>の 見たこ:
It looks like a list of new books in the library. There are a lot of book names that you've never seen before.
You were particularly interested in the books titled "School Hunk List" and "School Madonna List".

137577.<left>迷いスライム 探しています。\n<left>僕の相棒 ツルりんが 行:
I'm looking for a lost slime. My buddy Slippy has gone missing. Features: Slippery and Smooth. Bounces well.
If you have any idea where he is please contact Halbel at Ⅱ‐Wulfspade.

137578.<left>『期間限定！ 学割の お知らせ』という題名で\n<left>さまざま:
There is a list of various discounts with the
title "Limited time! Student Discount Notice".
It seems this perk is unavailable to teachers.

137579.<left>勉学！ 部活！ 寮生活！\n<left>なんでも そろう！\n<le:
Studying! Club Activities! Dorm Life!
We've got everything!
Welcome to the school shop!!

137580.<left>ベホマン焼きそばパンは 人気商品につき\n<left>おひとりさま:
Please note that only one Cureslime Yakisoba
Bread can be purchased per person due to its
popularity. Thank you for your understanding.

137581.<left>学食の献立表のようだが\n<left>内容が 古いままになっている！:

137582.<left>３年生の進路相談会について 掲載されている。:

for third-year students.

137583.<left>生徒たちが 自由に 書き置きした\n<left>メモのようだ。\n<:
It appears to be notes that the students have freely jotted down. You read one of them.
Those interested in coming to the party, it's gonna be a very big bash. You want to live in a fun and exciting school!
Please contact me, the Party King.

153545.<center>宝箱専門店 『パンドラボックス』\n<center>小さな島で:

153549.<left>アラハギーロ王家 御用達の宝箱 発売中！\n<left>普通に開ける:

What's this?! It's an exotic treasure chest that opens when you perform the "Sun Dance"!

154227.<left>なんの部活動に入ろうか 迷っている方は\n<left>部室を訪ね ど:
If you're not sure what kind of club you want to join, visit the club room and ask around. The friendly manager and senior members are
waiting for you to join the club. Let's live a club activity life.

154228.<left>娯楽室での息抜きは ほどほどに。: Relax in the rec room, but in moderation.

staff take turns cleaning.

154231.<left>フフッ。この張り紙に たどり着いたきみは\n<left>学園内の至る:

Second School Building - 2F, next to Rec Room.
First School Building - 2F, Central East.
Second School Building - 3F, next to Student Guidance Office.

154232.<left>新入部員 歓迎のお知らせでござる。\n<left>我が釣り部では 釣:

163474.<left>旧校舎では お静かに願います。\n<left>事務室に ご用の方は:

323287.空っぽの箱が 無造作に散らばり\nシャイニーメロンが ひとつ 転がっている……。:
Empty boxes are scattered haphazardly.
One Shiny Melon lies on the floor...

325363.シオンによって再生された 神の緋石は\n神代のチカラによって まばゆく 輝いてい:
The Divine Crimsonite, which had been
regenerated by Shion, shines brilliantly with
an ancient, divine power.

326405.<center>『風の民 エルフ』\n自然を愛し 森と共に生きる\n背に小さな羽:
"Elves, People of Wind" They are beautiful people with wings on their back who love
nature and live with the forest. They value tradition, studied the ways of the world, and produced
many excellent spellcasters.

326406.<center>『炎の民 オーガ』\n厳しい荒野で チカラ強く生きる\n大きな身:
"Ogres, People of Fire" They live strong in the harsh lands, with large bodies, horns and
tails. They are belligerent, respect the strong and use their superior strength and stamina to
risk their lives for the weak.

326407.<center>『地の民 ドワーフ』\n雄大な山々に恩恵を受け 大地と共に生きる:
"Dwarves, People of Earth" They live with the earth, blessed by the majestic mountains, with small
bodies and big ears. With their high technology and strong desires, they built many advanced civilizations
with their pure dexterity and speed.

326408.<center>『水の民 ウェディ』\n海に浮かぶ美しい島々で 自由に生きる\n:
"Weddie, People of Water" They live freely on beautiful islands in the sea and their bodies are blue like
water. They hate constraints and value singing and love. They use their speed and strength to fight only when they
have to protect those they love.

326409.<center>『花の民 プクリポ』\n絵本のような色彩の町で 楽しさを求めて生:
"Pukulipo, People of Flowers" In a town with colors like a picture book, they have fluffy, adorable
little bodies living in search of fun. Born with strong magical power and dexterity, they are more
passionate about creating things for fun than for fighting.
